resources:
// Application
Browser You must grant \"Access Storage Permission\" to save screenshots and downloads. After that you should completely close the app or restart the phone. If you don\'t permit the storage access but want to use the screenshot function at a later time, you can grant the permission later. Please open then: system settings - apps - HHS Moodle. In the permissions section you can grant the \"write storage permission\". Share screenshot using: Share image using: Share link using: Choose file with: Enter url or search term … Enter search term … Enter title … Searched for:
// Menu Items
Search History Save website Save screenshot Save as bookmark Save to readLater Share website Share screenshot Share link as text Copy link to Clipboard Open downloads Settings Search on site Previous Next Cancel
// Context Menu
Save image Share image Add to readLater Link successfully copied Saving image as:
// Snackbar
OK Cancel Never show Downloading file: Do you want to download: Download completed. Show download manager? Permissions granted? Can not go back. Can not go forward. Backup successful. Restore successful. Backup failed. Restore failed. Failed to create screenshot. No internet connection. Trying to load from cache.
// Bookmarks // ReadLater
List item will be removed. OK? You need at least one list item! Delete list item Adding to bookmark list. Edit title
Adding to readLater. Clear list Open last saved link: Open readLater list
// Settings
About | Help App settings Privacy | Security Data
Permission dialog Show again: Permission dialog?
License The app is completely open source and licensed under GPL3.
Settings Open the system settings of the app. There you can, depending on your Android version, manage several things (Storage, network traffic, permissions, …).
Swipe Swipe left or right to navigate through websites.
Font size Change font size for websites.
Backup Backup your bookmarks and readLater lists to sdcard. A new backup overwrites the old one.
Restore Restore your bookmarks and readLater lists from sdcard.
Enable javascript Some functions on the websites need javascript to work. But javascript is known to be a security risk.
Enable cookies Visited websites are storing their cookies on your device, mostly to improve user experience. For example settings for a search site are stored in cookies.
Enable third party cookies Third party cookies are not from the visited website. Mostly they collect information about your browsing behavior to send you personalised advertisements.
Clear history on exit Clear your browser history on exit.
Help Show a short help dialog.
Search engine Choose your preferred search engine.
Wikipedia Choose your preferred language for Wikipedia.
Offline Save websites in cache for offline use. Disable clear cache to use.
Clear cache Clear browser cache on exit. Disable, if you want to use offline functionality.
Clear cookies Clear all cookies on exit. Website settings will get lost.
Clear form data Clear all form data on exit. All saved form entered data (e.g. mail addresses) will get lost.
Form data Save entered form data (e.g mail addresses).
